content.detailedDescription:
this is my third report to mufon and with each sighting significantly becoming more sophisticated and more choreographed. i watch them every night and have since late last summer. each night they would stay in the same position for many days then they would  change positions focusing in other areas but remaining in those different positions for a period of time, also. when they finished they would  move on once again. i have watched their progression or movement with regard to position. they went from coastal to neighborhoods to airport. what next? please realize, i have watched these orbs, if you will, progress since last july 2013. no one in my area seems to be talking about it. hats off to mufon. where would we be without them investigating.  are people talking in your neighborhood? if they aren't, they should be.

one night, a week ago now, i went outside after viewing through my backyard window lots of bright shiny objects in the sky all around. there were so many in every direction, i couldn't begin to count them, and they were at different elevations. some would appear and disappear instantly, while others would stay out and remain in place for long lengths of time. i noticed as one started to instantly disappear after appearing, it was a blue orb fizzling out. 

i have witnessed many different behaviors with orbs and bright objects, it is difficult in this narrative to include them all. they have been viewed as having different shapes and sizes. i have taken many pictures and some are in color as well as others being white/grayish or otherwise. i believe those are beams from the lower in elevation appearing orb,  which i have viewed. in my photos there are two parts many times, particularly lately. one primary upper orb and the lower seems to be the object that is doing the gathering of data and imaging.

in the past two months, i have seen a very large thin crescent-like moon through the treetops in a westerly position. (i have seen the crescent face in both directions - west and south). when i first saw it, i really thought it was the moon shining through my window- remember this was late at night. however, it was shining so brightly like our sun does on a very sunny day, it got my attention very quickly. below it in a secondary position, much lower in elevation and at a different angle, was a huge bright shining orange circle. i saw the orange circle through my neighbor's fence in my backyard. i had my husband go outside on our back deck to see this bright orange appearing circle, also.  as i tried to get a photo of it, it would not allow me to capture it's bright orange color. it actually came out white, every time; i couldn't get it to appear like i was seeing it. the bright circle was huge and very very bright orange in color.

because of the photos i have taken,  especially in recent months, i have come to the opinion,  these orbs are taking pictures of many things such as buildings, airports and yes, even vehicles. i have the pictures to prove it. in my photo submission i have included several for mufon to view and access.
content.summary: Extremely bright objects appearing as huge crescent moon with second bright object below closer to houses and ground. each night a little different with closer to houses object. appeared to be taking photos of sites in neighborhoods and airport.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the desert (adobe buttes) outside delta, co, and had seen where someone just put a camera facing up to see what they get.  i put the camera on top of my jeep and let the video run.  as usual it was a very clear day out there.  where i was there are no trees, small shrubs & cactus, and sand, lots of sand.  while the camera was running i wasn't looking up and was just playing with my dogs.  when i came home and uploaded the film onto my computer is when i noticed this flash on the screen at 15 seconds into the video.  the object looks like it has a dark body with white wings.  there's only 2 types of birds out there (crows or kildeer) and there weren't any where i was, the dogs always scare them away.  the object flashes on the screen for a split second.  apparently it's traveling at a high rate of speed.  slowing the video down it only appears in 1 frame.  not a clue what this is.  several times now in that same area i've seen orbs and one was rather large (when i didn't have a camera!).
content.summary: Filming str8 up and object flashes in field of view 15 seconds in

content.detailedDescription:
Recently there have been some odd things going on at our home, like:
 1) i woke up one morning with a scar above my pubic bone, that i don't have any memory of having before. 2) i have had dreams of ufo's and aliens.
3) my husband and i both have woke up feeling violated, and nauseous, and light headed or the feeling of being drugged. 4) my younger daughter woke up in bed upside down, which has never occurred before.
5) i have a weird beebee sized thing just below my collar bone on my right side that is not attached to anything, i can actually like grab it with my fingers. i also when i was around 12 or so was witnessed by my older sister something lifting me up out of bed and carrying me towards the window (long story) any how these are just some of the stuff that has been going on, metallic tastes in mouth, ringing in the ears...
the newest is that i was abducted from my home about 1 week ago, my husband is witness to this. i also had physical evidence which he took pictures of, and also was left feeling very sick and sore.


 ( on the last picture, i know that it is not visible :( but there was a light bruising of what appeared to be a thumb print in my inner right thigh.) the others are clear of bruising on my outer arm, and on my armpit.


thank you,
lisa
content.summary: I did not witness a ufo, i was abducted from my home.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting outside smoking a cigarette. i was facing south. i always look up at the stars , moon, etc. for anomalies. it was clear, about 65 degrees, and the moon was a bright half moon. i am always looking at the night sky in hopes of observing a ufo. i never seen one in my life. i am a ufo buff. 

    i happened to be looking straight ahead to take a drag of my cigarette. i was very calm and peaceful. i was relaxed and not thinking of ufo's. all of a sudden, out of the corner of my right eye, a bright light seem to catch my attention. i looked right and there was the moon, but directly in it's sight path there was 2 basketball sized objects that were yellow, orange. the objects were not behind the moon, they were on my side of the moon. they were moving east headed almost over my house. they were about 10 inches apart from where i was sitting in my distance. they were following the same direction, but different paths. they were one in front and one behind, above and one below. 

    the very first thing i did was jump out of my chair to get my girlfriend robin, who just went to bed. i realized i better check again to see if i really seen this, as it was "unbelievable". i turned and stopped moving, i looked up and i was witnessing something i never thought i would see. those lights moving like a air vehicle. there appeared to be more going on about them. it was very busy in the area they were in. i estimated their speed to see if i had enough time to get robin. she was about 20 feet away in bed. first i thought don't go. then i thought i want someone else to see it to prove what i'm seeing. what made me leave was thinking robin may never see this in her life, so i went to get her. i screamed get up and come out. i ran back quick and they were gone. it was only seconds. she was on the porch looking while i ran off to check the sky over the house from the driveway. gone. i made a mistake, but i wanted to share it.

    my opinion is they suddenly appear in the moon area of the sky, as i had just looked away from that direction, then they appeared suddenly. all i know is i'm still excited and intend on watching every night for a couple hours. i believe they are there, one must be vigilant to see them. 

    there seemed to be an odd thing about it. when you see a plane go by, you can feel how it is "working" to travel like that. these things, seem to move like they were floating. they were moving fast, but like floating in the air..
content.summary: Sitting on porch. out of corner of my eye noticed bright lights. the moon was half moon. under the moon i observed 2 orb shaped objects, glowing orange and yellow. they were moving east almost would have went right over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the backyard with the dogs at about 10:30 p.M. the night of thursday, may 8th, 2014.  i often observe the night sky when i am out at night with the dogs.  i was looking up. an elongated, fat, (not a thin line) shape that was a completely bright light, almost like it was on fire, appeared in the sky off to the south.  it was huge so it looked like it was close.  my house is two blocks north of a cemetery and it looked like it was going to crash in the cemetery. the actual size was very hard to determine as it looked very close because it was so big, but i could tell that it was farther away because the cemetery is so close.  it was coming down straight to the ground.  the front 3/4 of the object was a solid, bright fiery white light and the back 1/4 was a solid, bright green light.  i did not see a trail of any kind.  it was completely silent....No sound what so ever.  it looked as though it must have gone straight down to the ground, but from my suburban backyard i would not be able to see off into the distance to see if it hit the ground or where it would have hit the ground.  there were no planes in the sky.  it looked nothing like a firecracker or anything like that.  it looked nothing like anything i have ever seen.  i have never seen anything that shape, color, that bright and fiery looking, that was completely silent coming straight to the ground.  i have not seen anything in the news about it.  usually if it's a plane crash or something like that, it's reported in the news.  but it looked nothing like a plane of any kind.
content.summary: Suddenly appeared - bright white light on 3/4 of elongated shape, bright green on back 1/4 heading down to ground - looked like it would crash - no sound

content.detailedDescription: I live in an extremely rural area in ms.  i'm semi-retired, and spend a lot of time outdoors.  last night, after watching a movie, i stepped outside of my house and walked west toward my garden.  i have a nightly chore that i was tending to.  that was the hand-rotating of my solar panels to face the morning easterly sun-rise.  there is a fixed mercury-arc lamp on a telephone pole near where my solar system sits on a trailer.  i rotated one bank or panels, and as i'm apt to do, i glanced up at the sky.  my house sits in the middle of a seven-acre pasture in the middle of a 300 acre farm.  when i looked up, i was immediately stunned to see a large, round (from my perspective) object directly over my head.  it was emanating bright blue/white lights outward around its outer edge, and had red lights interspersed unevenly between the bright blue-while lights.  the object was slowly rotating, and almost immediately began moving slowly (about as fast as i can run) westwardly over my garden, and the tree-line beyond.  there are two tree-lines... the first is wild-hardwood (oak, cedar, etc.)  40 feet beyond that a cultivated pine thicket with pine trees (lob-lolly) that are nearly adult (tall).  it wasn't until the object had moved over the second tree-line that i realized i should try to video, or snap a picture of what i was seeing.  i ran as fast as i could into the house, grabbed my iphone, ran back outside to my previous location, and could still see the object moving slowly away.  the lights were so bright that it made a glow beneath it moving over the pine thicket.  by the time i "logged" into my iphone, and launched the camera app, the object had moved beyond my line of sight, and i no longer could perceive the "glow."  as it moved away from overhead... to the west, i did see that it had a curvature on top (a dome if you will).  the surface appeared dark, but again had these stunningly crisp and clear, bright lights around the edge.  at times the lights (red and bluish-white) seemed to cross over each other around the edge.  sort of "dancing" around the edge of the circular/domed object.  this light dance appeared to be independent of the crafts slow rotation.  again, not a single sound could be heard, which surprised me.  in fact, it seemed like there was not even the normal "natural" frog/cricket/bird cacophony that i'm used to hearing constantly.  i never felt scared or threatened at anytime during this encounter.  in fact the only unusual "feeling" i had was a heightened sense of awareness.  i was truly shocked, breathless, amazed and in a way hypnotically fixated on the object when i first saw it.  i have seen things i could not explain before (meteor-like objects that make 90 degree turns... glowing orbs around fredericksburg, tx near enchanted rock... and a few other things)... but i have always felt that i didn't know what i had seen after the fact.  this is different.  i'm sure i saw a craft that is nothing like any technology that i'm aware of from my understanding of physics and current human technology.  the impressions that overwhelmingly remain with me regarding what i saw last night are: 1).  absolute silence, 2). super crisp/clear/bright lights that strangely emanated from around the edge of the circular (bottom-up perspective) craft... and that the lights didn't appear to be coming from fixed points on the edge of the craft, 3). the object rotated slowly, and moved slowly away... without sound, 4). i believe the object was relatively close 300-600 feet over-head at the beginning of the encounter, then perhaps 1000 yards or less when it vanished from my view.  i truly wish i had been able to capture some proof of what i saw, to share.  but i must say... this changes my view of reality.  i am sure, as a human can be, that what i saw was not a human-created object.  please feel free to contact me if you have further questions.  i tried to be as detailed in my above account, while being cautious not to misrepresent what i saw.  sincerely, d.P.
content.summary: Large, round, dead-silent, most vivid lights i've ever seen, hovering, slowly moving away while rotating very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the east side of the st johns river looking across the water to the west, on the other side 2 clusters of orange sphere like lights were hovering very high in the air. i was immediately intrigued and began to observe the objects. i know they were over 2 miles away because the width of the river in the area is about 2 miles, making the objects seem very large based on the distance i was observing them from. as i was watching i observed each light disappear and another re-appear shortly after. there were two clusters each making a strait line angling 45 degrees in a negative slope in accordance to the horizon. they resembled the stripes of red dots one would acquire when having a brush with poison ivy. for about 15 minutes they disappeared an re-appeared until the disappearing became more frequent than the re-appearing. eventually there were only four left and they methodically dissipated into thin air.
content.summary: Orange spheres hovering high in the sky. they would appear from nothing, dissapear and re-appear somwhere else.

content.detailedDescription: I dont see much air trafic around us so this caught my attention. it looked like three planes but i never seen fly like that before.
content.summary: At work saw these three trails coming across lake superior looked interesting.

content.detailedDescription: It was may 7th, 2014 at 12:50am. me and my girlfriend just left the movies and were on cherry tree road when i noticed an orb of light in the sky that suddenly flew up on us with incredible speed. as i kept driving we noticed the orb was actually following us so we stopped in the middle of the road to check it out. the orb was moving across the sky and when i stopped my vehicle the orb also stopped and hovered in place, then i hit the gas a little bit and when i did the ufo also began to move and then i came to a stop again, and so did this orb of light.  me and my girlfriend were both freaking out by this point because we know there is no way for an airplane to just stop in place and hover, and this thing was following us. this craft also had no sound to it.  so anyway my girlfriend was freaking out begging me to take her home and at this point i was a little freaked out so i turned my car around and started heading home and as soon as i did i could see the object in my side mirror it suddenly turned into three balls of light (bright white) all side by side ( i believe on the same craft) and it flew up on us again, me and my girlfriend both started to freak out but i decided to turn the car around to get a better look. when i turned around the craft stopped coming towards us and hovered in place and was now again one ball of light. i drove towards it and it began to move away from us. i again stopped in the road and the orb also stopped. i told my girlfriend "it is following us watch when i stop it will stop." i stopped the vehicle and the orb also stopped and hovered there. i said "now when i hit the gas it is also going to accelerate." so i hit the gas hard and got to about 30 mph. this orb immediately matched our speed as soon as i hit the gas. i said, "watch it is going to stop when we do." i slammed on the brakes hard and came to a dead stop. so did the orb. my girlfriend absolutely lost it then and was almost crying. my girlfriend begged me to take her home and so we left. she was scared and i didn't want anything to happen to us so i drove us home. the object followed us the whole way and seemed to dissapear once we got in my drive way. we both were freaking out. i was absolutely fascinated by the fact we could have just made contact with aliens or some kind of super advanced technology. while this was happening i pulled out my iphone and tryed to record a video. even though the object was pretty close, my camera made it look as if it was miles away. shitty ass iphone.. i was pissed, i filmed for a few seconds and turned my phone off realizing i couldn't get a clear enough video. i have attached my video below, you can see the orb of light blinking in the sky but that's all you can see. i went out and purchased a 300 camcorder with night mode and 1080p recording so if this happens again i can document the whole thing. this is not a lie or a joke, this really happened and me and my girlfriend are both in shock over what we experienced. this was in noblesville indiana on cherry tree road started at 12:50 and we got home at 1:05. i checked the time because i thought we were going to get abducted and i made my girlfriend and i put our seatbelts on so we couldn't be... this was insane and my mind is blown!  idk what to think about what happened but it has affected me and it's all i can think about since that night. we have not told anyone else about this because we know we will just be called crazy. that's why i'm reporting it here, i'm also hoping there was someone else who witnessed this and reports it also.
content.summary: Ufo followed me and my girlfriend home when we drove home from the movies.

content.detailedDescription: I live near fayetteville nc and i have plenty of sightings.Helicopters chasing objects and searching for objects.I know this because when there is a mass amount of helicopters,then that's when you can clearly see objects lights flying around and hiding behind the tree's.It's as if they are playing with the helicopters,and as if the helicopters are chasing it.Any ways back to the subject,i went through my surveillance camera and seen what look like an entity or what ever it is come from behind the video surveillance and go straight through my front door.I thought it was a person,but i doubt that.I am so use to the fact of always seing these things that i am neither afraid nor panicked.Whenever i see the helicopters flying low to my house i go outside and start recording.At one time after the helicopters got tired of searching and left, a huge object rose from behind the tree and hovered in the opposite direction.Can you check this picture out and contact me if you wish to see the video.
content.summary: Alien like entity observed on porch nightvision camera

content.detailedDescription:
During the night of 5 may and morning hours of 6 may 2014 my outside surveillance camera video recorded a triangular object hovering above my driveway on three different times. they were 1930.57 on 5 may, 2230.30 on 5 may 14, 0127.52 on 6 may 14, and 0503.45 on 6 may 14. each video recorded for 40 seconds. during each recording the object did not move. it appeared to just hover above my drive way with lights shining. one light can be seen projected in my front yard using another camera (the blueish looking one. i did not witness this because i went to sleep around 11pm. i do recall my dog starting barking around the time the object first appeared right before i went to bed. i didn't think nothing of it at the time.  all of the snapshots are taken of video from my 3 motion activated cameras.
i have attached the pictures along with a daylight picture of the driveway for reference.


i would like to know if your site can explain this object.  thank you.
content.summary: Object was recorded above my drive at 3 different times with outdoor cameras i have at my house.

content.detailedDescription: Well me and my brother in law left my house we were going just about three miles to a house trailer we were getting ready to move we backed out of my driveway and headed northwest about a half mile i saw something shinning up in the sky as i looked on i said to him look what is that ?And knowing him as a kind of a skeptic he said it looks to me like an airplane with the sun shinning off of it and then i said its not an airplane because if it was it would be going a lot faster then it is and i added it don't have any wings and is way to low and it looked like it was almost hovering it was going so slow we turned right on state road 81 going about another half mole we turned left on what we call drycreek rd. the name of the road is something else i really cant think of the name of that road rite now but anyway we went on that road for about three more miles and then we turned right on the road that his trailer was it was less then a half mile to where it was at we pulled in the driveway got out and started getting our tools out  i looked up and said to him look man there it is again and i asked him what the hell is that thing he said i don't know i said to him look it dosent have any wings and look how slow it is going we did not hear a sound at all it was so low if it was making any noise we could have heard it we both looked at the thing for about three or four minutes he didn't seem to be very interested in it but i was i kept looking at it it was very shiny metallic craft i know that it was not a blimp a plane or balloon  or nothing like i have ever seen before it just fascinated me i saw what looked like little windows at the top of it and maby like some kind of vents on  and what looked like an antana or something i really couldn't see close enough to know for sure i could see that it had rounded sides well it was shaped like a capsule i wish i would have kept watching it but we had work to do so i take a couple of steps and grab a big floor jack and pulled it over to where i was going to use it. it probably took me less then a minute to do so . and then i looked back up to where i saw the thing at and it was gone i looked everywhere for it in the sky but it was simply gone it was like it just vanished it was just gone it had to have left at a very fast speed i didn't know what it was then and i don't know what it is now it kinda freaked me out ya know its been bothering me because i could not identify it so to me it was a true ufo. i would guess its size at about at least a hundred feet or even longer .I kinda thought that it mite be the government at first but then i felt it was not from this earth i just couldn't believe we saw this thing in browed daylite it was a solid object it did what it did and then it was gone. i think it mite have been following the river or something like that.
content.summary: This thing was capsul shaped like a tylenol and was real shiny like aluminum foil it was either reflecting sunlite or was making its own lite ireally couldnt tell was traveling very slow almost hoveringi know it was not an air plane or blimp it was odd

content.detailedDescription: Having contact now. taken at night.  they have injured me and caused me pain. the say an invasion is imminent. they want to use people as weapons somehow.
content.summary: Abduction for 2days viditations at night

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside of my 2nd story apartment about 11:12 pm to collect my laundry, as i got to the bottom of the steps i noticed what appeared to be a silent convoy of about 9 to 10 ships about 800 to 1000 feet (estimated) passing by overhead, completely silent and in a perfect v formation with one ship in the front. the objects had no lights on but appeared to be a very light brown/gold/copper in color with what seemed to be a reflective glow around each of them. at first i thought they might be birds- but in the short seconds i caught them flying overhead, i noticed one seemed to disappear then reappear, and i also noticed that one or two of them flipped themselves around once in a circle while still staying in the formation. also the crafts appeared very defined- it was difficult to make out a definitive shape, but i was able to make out that they were some kind of vessels with lines indicating either beveled edges or some kind of pattern. i would estimate they were moving at a speed of about 150 miles an hour or more, it's hard to estimate exactly but they were moving extremely fast. i had dropped my laundry to try and follow them and saw that they were heading south towards inglewood/south central. by the time i pulled out my phone to video it, it was too late and the objects were headed over the horizon past my line of sight. a neighbor was outside asking how i was doing and i told him what i had just seen and he laughed as if i was insane. i don't know if it's related, but my phone froze when i got inside and tried to call/message people. about a minute later, a helicopter flew south overhead in the same direction- there was no way it would've been able to catch them though.

after, i was in a state of disbelief and a little ticked off at myself that i wasn't able to get more details and make a film of it in time. it happened so fast that the only way anyone else would've seen it was if they happened to look up at just the right time. i feel that the total silence and absence of any noise, along with the reflecting surface and perfect motion i witnessed from the objects indicates it may be something we humans would not be capable of making....
content.summary: V formation of 9-10 silent non-lit but reflecting objects seen moving south over culver city at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first time that i have had one of these experiences, in fact i do believe that they are continueing and i am glad that i have kept a journal since 2007. my mom also syas that the aliens have been coming to me since i was a baby. this information i was not aware of until recently. preceeding these events strange things have begun to happen before the events. lights turning on and off on their own. electrical appliances not working and then working. dog very restless and have even experienced hearing things fall over and not been able to find the source. on the 3/5/2014 i woke when my dog gave one bark and went quiete. i have never heard him bark like that and not carry on. it was thenthat i heard a humming noise out side. i got up and looked out my bedroom window but saw nothing. i then went into the lounge and looked out that window and saw nothing. here is where the problem comes in. i don't remembver going back to bed. i began to dream that i unlocked the security gate and the front door and went into the garden because i suddenly saw a huge glowing butterfly. first it glowed yellow, then luminious green and then luminious blue. it was about the same size as my two hands next to each other. then as i edged towards it it came and landed on my left arm. it made its way up and around the back of my neck. for a minute i grew afraid because i could not see it. then it crawled down my right arm and settled on my right thumb. i watched it attach its two black feelers on its head around my thumb and then it inserted its backside into my hand. i could feel everything and it was the most unpleasant feeling, i could feel the pressure. suddenly it was gone. when i woke the next morning i was shocked to know that i did not remember going back to bed and the worst thing is i actually felt ill where as the night before i had been fine. i had a terrible head ache and the left side of my body, especially around my neck and temple was very sore. i spent the entire day taking pain killers but nothing seemed toi help. the reason why i have posted this is because going back ocver my journal this is not the first time that i have dream't of strange surgical procedures and i have dreamt of the greys before as well. usually the next day after these dreams i wake up feeling sick and detached from the worls. in the 1990's i recall been abducted and i still remember seen the inside of a ufo. the walls were just light and switches and i remember not been able to move. i recall seen a brown claw like hand with only four fingers holding an injection type thing and all i remember is saying no before i blacked out. i have no idea what happened after that. i have finally decided that i now need to get to the bottom of this and would appreciate it if some one could help me find an investigator in durban south africa that i can get in touch with. it is quite obvious that it is still going on and i would like to know why. my daughter who is seven is to frightened to sleep in her own room because she says that a black man with huge black eyes comes to visit her at night and he hurts her. she does not know anything about my experiences and this frightens me.
content.summary: Dog gave one bark, woke up. heard humming noise. cannot remember going back to bed

content.detailedDescription: Another extremely-significant case has been "abducted" from mufon's website.  this time, case 56107 submitted may 8, 2014 by a u.S. navy radar operator aboard a destroyer patrolling off the coast of israel in the mediterranean sea.  the subject reported that his vessel tracked a ufo moving at extremely fast (non-conventional) speed over israel which caused the captain of said destroyer to quickly come about and order counter measures be taken, not knowing if perhaps his ship and crew were about to be attacked, even though ets never attack first and only respond combatively in self defense.  when i tried accessing details about this case early on the morning of may 9, 2014 via the normal means by searching the case on mufon's real-time ufo map it came back with the message "56107 is not a valid sighting id."  conversely, i had absolutely no problem accessing details for the two cases above and below.  details for case 56106 and 56108 were readily available.  this is not the first time that we have seen a case of extreme significance "abducted" from mufon's archives.  we also have seen important photos, videos, and links mysteriously "go missing" from mufon's "last 20 sighting reports" page - "moved to la de da land" where said items submitted by honest citizens seeking to share cannot be accessed or viewed by the public.  we could say more but choose to keep some of our intelligence in black and "gray" boxes pending possible publication in mass media not subject to u.S. government control and influence.  when money comes through the back door control is lost and so is trust.  is mufon becoming a "house of secrets"?  another piece of the puzzle palace?  "enquiring minds want to know."  click on links to see what i mean because "the truth is out there."
content.summary: Abduction: details about mufon case 56107 submitted may 8, 2014 by u.S. navy radar operator aboard destroyer mysteriously goes "missing" from mufon's website

content.detailedDescription: I was at the garden of my house and was playing with my dogs.Nothing made me notice it but i have a habit to look in the sky for orion belt,i was seeing it as usual then i saw a yellow and red flamed ball that was moving in a very strange speed.1st i thought it was a black magic thing but then i realized it was ufo only.
content.summary: It was like a yellow and red fire which was moving at a strange speed,in a group of 3

content.detailedDescription:
1. at the science department and viewing the nasa footage of what
happened to the apollo mission which was zapped by a photon or
laser beam.  twice.  lightening does not strike twice.  nasa does 
not launch any space craft or satellite with thunder clouds or storms
in the area.
2. the nasa film.
3. a space ship.
4. it shot a laser beam at the apollo craft.
5. it was unbelievable.
6. houston we had a bogie.
content.summary: Apollo mission 12 was not hit by lightening twice.  nasa does not launch any space craft or satellite with storms or thunderstorms in the atmosphere.  two laser like beams of high energy light - laser beams - hit the space craft.  houston we have a boogie

content.detailedDescription: There were 5 of us hiking and right after sundown in the night while all standing in the bird cave a light apeared above us and the 30 feet of rock above us in particles then went slowly horizontily seemingly scanning us the light fell like water down through the openings of the cave where the birds live then disintegrated we were all stareing and motionless and none dared to go underneath it
content.summary: We were in the "bird cave" when a beam materialized but ended in the sky the light fell through openings in the cave like water

content.detailedDescription: My stepbrother and i where driving on a street about 2 blocks from my home. i caught a reflection from the corner of my eye from an object that i first thought was a jet. we passed a small patch of trees and the object was traveling in the total opposite direction in which we first saw it. the object was boomerang shape, maybe silver. it was hard to tell with the sun reflecting off of it. after we saw it we just looked at each other then i asked my stepbrother what he saw, and he confirmed what i also saw. i was excited in a way but also confused. after i asked him what he saw. we looked up again and we couldn't find it in the sky anywhere. i must add that when we saw it, it was moving slow.
content.summary: While driving my stepbrother and i saw a boomerang shape flying torward the sun, we passed a small patch of trees then it was moving in the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: My stepbrother and i where driving on a street about 2 blocks from my home. i caught a reflection from the corner of my eye from an object that i first thought was a jet. we passed a small patch of trees and the object was traveling in the total opposite direction in which we first saw it. the object was boomerang shape, maybe silver. it was hard to tell with the sun reflecting off of it. after we saw it we just looked at each other then i asked my stepbrother what he saw, and he confirmed what i also saw. i was excited in a way but also confused. after i asked him what he saw. we looked up again and we couldn't find it in the sky anywhere. i must add that when we saw it, it was moving slow.
content.summary: While driving my stepbrother and i saw a boomerang shape flying torward the sun, we passed a small patch of trees then it was moving in the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: I saw what i thought was a falling star coming almost straight down at an extreme high rate of speed then level off at tree top, it made some impossible movements then 4 f-16s came it, it was joined by two other ufos, the jets had full afterburner and the ufos would.At the blink of an eye be in a different part of.The sky, this happened a few more times, then it got very close.To.Me.Then hovered, thats when i took some pics,, after a total of 45 minutes they went straight up into the heavens at a complete impossible speed...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a ufo coming straight down at a very high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was observing mars that night was when you could see it clear and it was the time every 4 years that you could view mars it was very orange. i did not see the ufo with my eyes but when i looked though my digital camera i could see the ufo. it was i think round and had white lights on each corner and blue and red lights in between maybe four or five blue and two red. the white lights were much bigger then all of the rest. when i looked at it with out the camera it was not there. i tried to take a picture and i did. i was a bit shaky and did the best that i could. it was hard to find it looking at the camera screen and scanning the sky. it must have had some kind of cloaking technology. i do have the picture but it is not in my computer so at this time i can not send it to you until i can figure out how to upload it into my computer. thank you.
content.summary: I could not see it with my eyes just with my camera.

content.detailedDescription:
It must have been about 8:30pm when i observed something like a rectangle in the distance, it seemed to be hovering over the caribbean sea, south of isla mujeres in cancun. i observed this phenomena from the 5th floor of the hyatt regency in cancun, where i was staying for about a week. the object was hovering over the water. i was fast enough to capture this object on hd video camera. it stay still for about 2 minutes and then disappeared. you can see it disappear on video. 
it was a dark clear night, with a few clouds here and there but the sky was very clear that night. there were no planes in the area at the time the ufo appeared. it appeared as a grey long rectangular object. i would thus like to share this video with like minded people who have an interest in the ufo phenomena. its up to the general public to decide if this is anything otherworldly or just a phenomena in the night sky.
content.summary: It must have been about 8:30pm when i observed something like a rectangle in the distance, it seemed to be hovering over the caribbean sea, close to isla mujeres in cancun. i observed this phenomena from the 5th floor of the hyatt regency in cancun

content.detailedDescription: I am a male, 75+ years old.  when i was 8 yrs old, 67 years ago,  i watched an object approx. 4' x 1.5' x 2" drop out of the sky from approx. 100' when i first noticed it.    it was pure white round or radius edges, slightly wider (round) at both ends.  it oscillated (rocked) back and forth or left and right moving downward right toward me.  it got to within 15-20' over me oscillated a few times, then moved upward in the same manner it had descended until it was out of site.  i wasn't afraid because i was young and curious.  after it disappeared i continued playing in the yard and barn. i've never mentioned this to anyone before because it didn't seem important and i just went about my life.  however,  now with all the stories i thought i would mention it and see if anyone else had experienced a similar  situation and had not mentioned it for fear of ridicule or whatever. if i was an artist i would try to draw this object, but i am not artistic.  anyone that wants to speak with me about drawing it for me, i'd like to hear from you.  this incident happened in beaver dam michigan, between hudsonville and zeeland.  i am living in georgia.  "after thought" at first i thought it might be a piece of paper floating down, but as it got closer i could see it wasn't paper, it had to much mass and it wasn't aimlessly floating.
content.summary: See detailed

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving west on hwy 98 through franklin county, fl to visit family. out of the corner of my eye i noticed what looked like a shooting star moving from south over the gulf of mexico to approximately n or nw heading, but when i fixed my sight on the object it still had not disappeared. at that point i point it out to my wife and she confirmed she also seen the object. the object appeared to be a "ball" of light moving to fast to be an airplane but to slow to be a shooting star. when i first noticed it the object was over the gulf and approximately 10 to 15 seconds later it vanished over land. at that point i realized that was nothing i have ever seen before. the object just vanished at what i believe was a "burst" of super fast speed.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star, except was moving slower and had no trail.

content.detailedDescription: My girl & i were i were in separate rooms after an argument . we both heard fighter jets and ran to our balcony , we both saw 2 ufo's hovering between the submarine communication towers at n. severn naval base. a third light arrived to meet the two and hovered a few seconds and the the 3 shot off at a staggering speed. the towers are clearly visible from our balcony. we both agreed that there was no doubt that the jets were attempting to approach crafts. it was a no brainer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Heard jets ran to window 2 hovering between towers n. severn naval towers 3rd met at site hovered rocketed away

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a show about abductions, but then i started remembering these faces. i remember taller pale people with light hair, they are guiding me through a hall and i see these robot things working and the guy was explaining it, i saw through a glass a whole room of the people listening to one. the place looked huge inside. i am still trying to remember it all.
content.summary: All i know is i just remember some strange events in a craft with pale people and robots. i now feel anger and anxiety and insomnia

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog out of my back door for his nightly constitutional, which faces west, when i noticed an extremely bright blue orb hovering above the tree tops and houses to the southwest of my position.

the orb was between 15 to 20 degrees in elevation from the ground, and was at least 5 to 6 times or more the apparent size of jupiter, or the around size of a pea held at arms length.
i was viewing it above the tops of houses and between two large trees without foliage, which are located on a street directly behind my home. the night was unusually clear and cool, and the crescent moon and jupiter were clearly visible at roughly 40 degrees of elevation. the sun had just set below the horizon 15 to 20 minutes or more before, and there was still a faint orange/purple glow visible from the sunset on the horizon, but stars were also visible along with the crescent moon and jupiter.

the orb itself was extremely bright by any lighting standards, and colored an beautiful blue color like the color of an absolutely clear blue sky during daylight hours, only a slightly darker shade.

when i first spotted the orb, it was hovering stationary in the sky. i immediately called my 20 year old daughter to the back door to verify the sighting for me, and also to verify the color of the craft, which she did.
the craft, which i had no doubt it absolutely was a craft of some type, then flew slowly in a northerly direction for 5 to 10 miles at about a small aircrafts speed, then immediately reversed direction without stopping and backtracked it's own course to arrive at it's exact starting point, stopped, and again hovered. the craft then ascended downward in a zigzag course in less that three seconds, stopped, rose vertically to it's starting point in less that 2 seconds, then stopped and hovered.
all during the crafts hovering and maneuvering, the craft wobbled very slightly, for lack of a better term, even when it was stationary, and it never varied in brightness.
i then ran into my house to retrieve my video camera, which was coincidentally on the floor next to the back door (i had to take it out the battery's needed to be charged for an upcoming trip), and then i ran back out the door, turned on my camera, and started filming. unfortunately, the camera's autofocus was on, and the camera would not focus on the object, so i took my eyes away from the still hovering orb to shut off the autofocus.
by the time i looked back up, a matter of 1 to 2 seconds, the orb had disappeared.

there were also other aircraft in the air that night, but they were flying extremely high or distant from my position, and there may have been some other small aircraft or helicopter flying from south to north during that time as well.

about 5 minutes later, while i was online at the mufon web site filling out a sighting report, the power supply on my tower computer, which is near my back door, started smoking and smelling bad, and my computer completely died. the power supply's main inductor had completely melted inside the shielded enclosure on the circuit board, without blowing any fuses or tripping my expensive power strips circuit breaker or surge protector. i meticulously maintain my computers, being an electrical technician, and when i took the power supply apart to inspect what had burned out and why, i could find no explanation for the electrical malfunction.

the night before (sunday may 4th) i witnessed a large completely red orb with a blue/white strobe at it's tail end fly from south to north on the same flight path that the blue orb had flown, but this one flew further north, and sort of like a helicopter would. it then came to a dead stop, shut off the blue/white strobe light, and ascended straight up into the air so high it disappeared into the starry background. the orb's speed was like watching an elevator go straight up into space.
this is the second time i have spotted a red colored craft ascend in such a manner in my area, the first time being much closer to my position, but never ever a blue colored orb, especially one so large.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering extremely bright blue orb, 5 times size of jupiter (also visible), fly's zig zag course, returns, hovers, then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I looked at the sparse clouds while sitting in my back yard with my wife after i had "flooded the kitchen with water for the fish tank.We soaked up most of the "flood" and placed a fan to evaporated the rest of the mess in the kitchen and went outside for a rest.I looked at the sky and saw the object.It appeared to me to have a slender center fuselage with crecent moon shaped "wings".It was moving fast but i got a pretty clear image as it raced by.It appeared to be very high in the sky.There was no sound as i would normally hear from any jet or other airplane.It was very bright and i lost sight of the object as it moved away fairly rapidly.I could hardly take my eyes off of the sky almost expecting to see another one.Several minutes past when i saw what i thought was a "jet" heading in the same flight pattern.It did't appear as high as the object but i did hear the far off rumble of a jet.My neck is stiff after scanning the sky in a high level of emotion.I wasn't afraid in the least.I have never seen any plane remotely like this object.Don't think it was a "stealth airplane" from my pictures of one.Wow!!
content.summary: Cresent shaped wings?Center skinny that appeared to be length cresent wings?
